Translations.welcome_message:
Console application with dynamic command loading
Type 'help' for command list or 'exit' to quit
Translations.command_not_found: Command '{0}' not found. Type 'help' for command list
Translations.exit_confirmation: Are you sure you want to exit? (y/n)
Translations.language_description: Sets or shows the current language
Translations.list_description: Lists all available commands and their status
Translations.update_description: Checks for and installs application updates
Translations.confirm_update: Are you sure you want to install the update? (y/n)
Translations.critical_update_warning: ⚠️ This is a critical update containing important security fixes!
Translations.auto_update_interval_set: Update check interval set to {0} hours
Translations.new_description: Creates a new extension script template in Extensions folder
Translations.missing_extension_name: Specify command name or extension file to enable (e.g.: enable mycommand or enable myextension.csx.disable)
Translations.multiple_extensions: Found multiple disabled extensions for command '{0}':
Translations.no_disabled_extensions: No disabled extensions found for command/file '{0}'
Translations.import_description: Downloads and installs an extension from the specified URL
Translations.missing_url: Specify extension URL to download (e.g.: import https://example.com/extension.csx)
Translations.debug_description: Runs a command in debug mode
Translations.missing_debug_command: Specify command to debug (e.g.: debug mycommand --args "test")
Translations.author: Author
Translations.verified_safe: This command is verified and safe
Translations.script_description: Executes commands from a text file
Translations.missing_script_file: Specify script file to execute (e.g.: script commands.txt)
Translations.alias_usage: alias add <command> <alias>, alias remove <alias>, alias list
Translations.scan_description: Scans script for potentially dangerous code
Translations.scan_missing_file: Specify script file to scan (e.g.: scan mycommand.csx)
Translations.scan_no_issues: No dangerous code patterns found in {0}
Translations.history_description: Shows command history or searches in history
Translations.history_invalid_count: Invalid count specified. Using default value.
Translations.logging_description: Enables or disables console logging output
Translations.toggle_spinner_description: Toggles spinner animation during command execution
